data.oai_dc:dc: Geographic coordinates and genotype data for the analysis of the spatial genetic structure of the moss Pleurochaete squarrosa

cpDNA sequence data from Grundmann et al. (2007, Molecular Ecology, 16, 709–722)If you use the data in this file, please cite the original publication: Grundmann, M., Ansell, S.W., Russell, S.J., Koch, M.A., & Vogel, J.C. (2007) Genetic structure of the widespread and common Mediterranean bryophyte Pleurochaete squarrosa (Brid.) Lindb. (Pottiaceae) — evidence from nuclear and plastidic DNA sequence variation and allozymes. Molecular Ecology, 16, 709–722.
